title: Andrew Cuomo Arraignment Is Postponed Over Court Filing
sub_head: Former New York governor due in court Jan. 7, not Nov. 17, after prosecutors call filing against him ‘potentially defective’
body:
ALBANY, N. Y.—Prosecutors said the complaint against former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo is “potentially defective” and successfully asked to push back his arraignment date in a letter filed with the court this week.
Albany County Sheriff Craig Apple last week said Mr. Cuomo, a Democrat, forcibly touched a former executive assistant during an encounter last year at the Executive Mansion. Mr. Cuomo denied the charges.
